name: Superior Room
description: Intimate and ideal for two, Superior Rooms promise an unforgettable stay. Marble fireplaces, elaborate mirrors, precious fabrics and moldings find an echo in spacious bathrooms with finely worked fittings. These rooms take on the air of an elegant 18th-century home, where past and present meet with style and glamour.
extras: Queen-size bed or twin beds (or cot available)
Complimentary seasonal fruit and mineral water

name: Executive Room
description: Spacious, bright and extremely refined, Executive Rooms express quintessence of Parisian chic. Around a majestic king size canopy bed is an eloquent array summarizing the French art of living: a period desk, a velvet bergère armchair, a generous fireplace and, from the window, a view over the rooftops of Paris.
extras: King-size or twin beds (additional bed or cot available)
Complimentary seasonal fruit and mineral water

name: Deluxe Room
description: Each Deluxe room is different, yet each offers the refinement and ideal proportions that define the French capital in its noblest form. A canopy bed, prints from the Grand Siècle, a marble fireplace, moldings, fine woodwork and crystal chandeliers invite every guest to feel like royalty.
extras: King-size or twin beds (additional bed or cot available)
Complimentary seasonal fruit and mineral water
